name: test
description: Registers a new test with the given name.
You can provide an optional `timeout` (in milliseconds) to specify how long to wait before aborting the callback.
Also under the alias `it(name, fn, timeout)`, which is meant to encourage writing test names that form a sentence when combined with `describe` -
e.g. `it("should return blah", ...)` if placed in a `describe` block called `myClass`, will print `myClass > should return blah` when running the test.
